description: Production deployment manifest for S2T (System-to-Tester) module

include_directories.description: Product-specific implementations - deploy only relevant product folder

product_specific_deployment.description: Only deploy the product_specific subfolder matching target product
product_specific_deployment.example: For GNR deployment, only include product_specific/GNR folder

notes.product_specific: The product_specific directory contains GNR, CWF, and DMR subfolders. Deploy only the relevant product folder to target environment.
notes.dependencies: S2T module requires DebugFramework for full functionality
notes.efi_tools: EFI Tools folder contains scripts that may be platform-specific
